definition: white close-grained wood of a tree of the genus Agathis especially Agathis australis
details:
noun
- white close-grained wood of a tree of the genus Agathis especially Agathis australis
- tall timber tree of New Zealand having white straight-grained wood
= synonyms: kaury
- resin of the kauri trees of New Zealand
= synonyms: kauri copal, kauri gum
